summary: Follow pals Ringo the rat and Oriole the ox as they work together battling the elements and their opponents to compete in the ultimate animal race, where only one can be crowned king.
cast: Fann Wong|Dennis Chong Kheng Chew|Jamie Yeo|Vernetta Lopez|Zhao Jing Chen|Johnny Ng|Yun Fei Li|Hock Lai Lim|Saik Nee Ng|Teck Wan Ng|Vivien Pei Ying Tan|Sau Long Wong|Tom Arnold
title: Sheng xiao chuan qi
